attributes.action: Stop the all new immgration in to this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is created to tell the PM that the British people feel like a second class citzen in our own country and our fed up with taking Immigrants from other countrys.  We also think all immigrants in to this country including those from the EU should be subject to a points system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
